title: Pediatric tuberculosis in a high burden setting: Socio-spatial distribution, blood elements features, and outcomes
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Célestin Bilolo, Juliette Atsame Ndong, Eliane Kuissi Kamgaing, Anicet Christel Maloupazoa Siawaya, Ofilia Mvoundza Ndjindi, Amandine Mveang Nzoghe, Marielle Leboueny, Bénédicte Ndeboko, Simon Ategbo, Joel Fleury Djoba Siawaya
